fields.body:
Hi,
{{ content_object.user.get_full_name }} ({{ content_object.user.email }}) just invited you to join Repower at Home.
Your challenge, if you choose to accept it, is to turn your home into a clean, mean,
energy-saving machine.

Click here to accept the invitation

{% if note %}

Here's what {{ content_object.user.first_name }} wants you to know:
{{ note|safe }}

{% endif %}

Repower at Home is giving homes across the country a power boost. We’re the
premiere online community for people who want to save energy, save money, and
save the world. As a member, you can access awesome energy-saving tips, link up
with groups in your ‘hood, and more.

Get started today – it’s free!

Sign up at repowerathome.com

Cheers,
The Repower at Home team
fields.name: Invite
fields.subject: Invitation from {{ content_object.user.get_full_name }} to Repower at Home

fields.body:
Hi,
{{ content_object.user.get_full_name }} wants you to attend a Repower at Home {{ content_object.content_object.event_type }}
in {{ content_object.content_object.location }} on {{ content_object.content_object.when|date:"LONG_DATE_FORMAT" }} at {{ content_object.content_object.start|time }}.

Click here to RSVP

{% if note %}

Here's what {{ content_object.user.first_name }} wants you to know:
{{ note|safe }}

{% endif %}

Later,
The Repower at Home team
